categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Old Republic

nodes.text: Sith Executioner was a title within the Sith Empire. It was given to those that had earn the position of dispatching the enemies of the Sith Emperor. At some point, the Sith Lord Koval Renge rose to this position but eventually his fear of his master turned to an attempt to betray the Emperor. However, his plot was discovered and the Emperor left his ceremonial executioner's blade broken off within his chest with the splinter giving him agonizing pain as punishment for his actions.
